channel.title: Summer Time | | OldSchool | | 317 | | Custom Bosses
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wksAi.png[/img][/center]
[left]Summer Time is a basic semi-old school server based around the 2006 era of Runescape. Although it may be based around that time period, that doesn't mean in any way this is an attempt at a recreation of the actual game itself.
The objective of this project is basically just to make a fun server that's unique or different from the others available to play, for instance - custom maps, custom bosses, custom npcs etc the list is limitless as to what I'd like to implement into the game.
Anyways, just thought I'd throw this up now and I'll probably finish up this thread when I get back tonight, just let me know if you're interested on working on this with me - I'm interested in a hoster aswell preferably somebody who can get a VPS when we enter the beta stages of the game.
[u][b]Positions available for Beta: [/b][/u] Head Moderator Moderator Moderator
[u][b]Positions available for Programming Now:[/b][/u] Server Sided Programmer - Me Server Sided Programmer - Client Sided Programmer - Me Client Sided Programmer - Website Developer - Graphics Artist -
Update's list until I make a development thread. [u]6/2/2012[/u] Added 100% working gnome glider to travel to Karamja, Varrock Home, Water Birth Island, feldip hills chinchompas, and Bandit's Camp. Started on a simple hunter base consists of catching butterflys, chinchompas and birds at the moment. Fire Cape's are now a member's only item. Finished my custom potion, restores health by 5 Health every 5 seconds for a period of 5 minutes. (Pretty useless potion probably already even created by jagex but I wanted to test some custom items out in the client so this was just a test more or less). [center][left][img]http://i.imgur.com/P3j3Z.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i96co.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oOciJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jGHPi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KbWFJ.png[/img][/center]

Although it may be based around that time period, that doesn’t mean in any way this is an attempt at a recreation of the actual game itself.

The objective of this project is basically just to make a fun server that’s unique or different from the others available to play, for instance - custom maps, custom bosses, custom npcs etc the list is limitless as to what I’d like to implement into the game.
